message: This is a fair offer considering the inflation penalty you'll incur if you delay.

Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before. I'm willing to compromise, but I won't go below this.
This is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point, considering the time pressure and the significant inflation penalty I've already incurred.
